explains: n. 职员；编辑；采访记者

sentences.en: To the contemporary HSBC staffer all that may sound barbaric.
sentences.cn: 对当前的汇丰职员来说，所有这些可能听起来野蛮，而要重建一个负责的和纪律严明的文化。

sentences.en: "He just doesn't listen to anybody," said a former staffer.
sentences.cn: 其曾经的一位幕僚说：“他听不进任何人的意见。”

sentences.en: Those infected included the infant child of an ABC News staffer.
sentences.cn: 感染者包括一名ABC新闻编辑的婴儿。
